ctaSection.title: Ready to Simplify Your Shared Expenses?
ctaSection.subtitle: Join thousands who are already making group payments stress-free and transparent. Get started today!

featuresGrid.smartGroupDescription: Create groups for any occasion. Easily add members and track shared expenses in one place, keeping everyone on the same page.
featuresGrid.flexibleSplittingDescription: Split bills equally, by exact amounts, or by percentages. We handle all the complex math, so you don't have to.
featuresGrid.debtSimplificationDescription: Our algorithm minimizes transactions, showing you the simplest way to settle up, saving everyone time and hassle.
featuresGrid.freeToUseDescription: Our service is and always will be free. No hidden fees or premium tiers—just a powerful, accessible tool for everyone.
featuresGrid.unlimitedUseDescription: Create as many groups, add as many friends, and track as many expenses as you need. No restrictions, no limits.
featuresGrid.zeroAdsDescription: Enjoy a clean, focused experience. We will never sell your data or clutter your screen with ads. Your privacy is our priority.
featuresGrid.subtitle: Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

heroSection.title: Effortless Bill Splitting,
heroSection.subtitle: Simplified & Smart.
heroSection.description: Say goodbye to awkward IOUs and complex calculations. Our app makes sharing expenses with friends, family, and roommates easy, fair, and transparent.
heroSection.subDescription: It's 100% free, with no ads and no limits.
heroSection.focus: Focus on what matters, not on the math.

policyAcceptanceModal.title: Accept Updated Policies
policyAcceptanceModal.acceptanceInstructions: Please read the policy above and click "Accept" to continue using Splitify.
policyAcceptanceModal.acceptCheckbox: I have read and accept this

landingPage.title: Effortless Bill Splitting - Splitifyd
landingPage.description: Say goodbye to awkward IOUs and complex calculations. Our app makes sharing expenses with friends, family, and roommates easy, fair, and transparent. It's 100% free, with no ads and no limits.
landingPage.disclaimer: This is a tool for tracking expenses, not for making payments.
landingPage.accountNote: To save and manage your expenses, you'll need a free account.
landingPage.privacyNote: We will never ask for sensitive financial details.
